website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality balsamic produced in Modena, Italy. Comes in an 8.5 fl. oz. bottle.
pros: Vinegar also features a thick consistency and smooth taste
Reviewers love the complex flavors offered by this balsamic
cons: Some isolated complaints of vinegar tasting too acidic and sweet

customer_reviews.title: A nice balance of quality and cost.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quick solution for a dinner party ... I needed a good balance between quality and cost. This Balsamic fit the need nicely and delivery was super fast. I read a number of reviews and this product got good reviews from quality sources I trusted. The taste is more complex than an off the shelf, supermarket balsamic. That said, I’ve bought very high end balsamic, and this isn’t that. It’s a great balance between quality and cost.
customer_reviews.author: MJR_Mpls

customer_reviews.title: I never knew a good balsamic could taste soo good
customer_reviews.text: Went on a NYC food tour and this store was on the agenda- they gave us a sample of their products and I was hooked on their balsamic vinegar. That was 3 years ago- I have been ordering this product since. It is marvelous!! I never knew a good balsamic could taste soo good!
customer_reviews.author: Rula

customer_reviews.title: This is the best balsamic vinegar I've ever tasted
customer_reviews.text: I first sampled this vinegar on a Food Tours of New York tasting tour. Up to then, I don't think I could have imagined how different balsamic vinegars could be. Well, they are. Honestly, I could eat this with a spoon - by itself. But if you really want a treat, combine it with Oliviers' basil infused olive oil. You'll never want to eat any other salad dressing ever.
customer_reviews.author: Candi Harrison

customer_reviews.title: A Superb Balsamic
customer_reviews.text: Holy Cow!! Awesome balsamic. Like nothing I've ever tasted. So far beyond any balsamic dressing I've ever had--fine restaurants included--it's in a league all it's own. This was expensive but there are aged balsamics out there for six times the price so I expect to pay more for excellent quality. Well worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Rich, thick,  and smooth with no bitterness
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stuff! Thick, sweet, but mostly a rich balsamic flavor without the bite or aftertaste common in strong balsamic. My wife said it has an almost wine like flavor. I'll be ordering this again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tiki L Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavor
customer_reviews.text: This balsamic vinegar is intensely flavored and syrupy in consistency. I use it for drizzling over salads mainly because I can avoid oily salad dressings altogether and savor the balsamic flavor by itself. A little goes a long way! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bean Sews

customer_reviews.title: delicious
customer_reviews.text: I mix it with olive oil for dipping.It is very nice and the taste of fig is wonderful.Dont over do the vinegar as it could be too strong. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Henson

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: If you prefer your balsamic thick and sweet, this one is my favorite. Just need a small amount. The flavor is great, not sharp like other cheaper brands. More expensive but, it's my salad go to.
customer_reviews.author: David Lambert

customer_reviews.title: All their products that i have ever tried have all been of the best quality you can find
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing Olivers & Co. products for years now. All their products that i have ever tried have all been of the best quality you can find. However, it's the balsamic vinegar that got me hooked and continues to be the only one i buy. I have even passed on this brand to family who now is hooked on these products as well!
customer_reviews.author: S H

customer_reviews.title: Superb Balsamic Vinegar
customer_reviews.text: We first tried O&Co oils and balsamic vinegars in 2008, and have continued to purchase them. Their balsamic vinegar is like a fine syrup; wonderful for a drizzle or for dipping fresh fruit. The fig flavored balsamic is one of our favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: and this batch is as excellent as the initial batch
customer_reviews.text: I had used Oliviers Balsamic previously, and this batch is as excellent as the initial batch. Very slightly sweet flavor and a wonderfully creamy texture. Perfect for salads and for adding balsamic to my fruit jams giving them a special flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Deerhound

customer_reviews.title: It is absolutely sublime!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best balsamic vinegar that I have ever tasted. It makes the most delicious salad you will ever taste. I knew it would be very special when I ordered it because I am familiar with this company. However, I wasn't prepared for such high quality. It's pricey, but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: CGS

customer_reviews.title: ... Test Kitchen review that correctly identified this as the best balsamic short of the aceto balsamico from Modena
customer_reviews.text: I first got this after the America”s Test Kitchen review that correctly identified this as the best balsamic short of the aceto balsamico from Modena, which is about 10 x the price. It is spectacular by itself as traditional balsamic is used dut is also great as an addition to sauces or dressings. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deb A.

customer_reviews.title: Seems diluted
customer_reviews.text: I’m suspicious that this is genuine Oliviers. The consistency is not as as thick and seems diluted...I’ll order direct next time.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Most importantly, you can be very, very sure this product is not made in China.
customer_reviews.text: Good as a condiment ; better if personally transformed with pepper flakes and herbs into sauce for salads or fried rice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Balsamic
customer_reviews.text: Great Balsamic Vinegar from Modena. At this price point you won't find any better. Very versatile, you can use it on salads, risotto and desserts.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tomei

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Balsamic!
customer_reviews.text: Prepared a salad dressing with the balsamic, same quantity of good EVOO, chopped shallot, salt & pepper + a dash of Dijon mustard. The BEST balsamic salad dressing we've ever had
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best I've tasted
customer_reviews.text: I'm just now getting into the world of finer olive oil and balsamic vinegars, but there is a mellow sweetness and mouth feel to this that I've not experienced before. Borders on luxurious. Looking forward to testing it on various dishes (so far just salad).
customer_reviews.author: BAT71

customer_reviews.title: Tangy, tasty vinegar
customer_reviews.text: We love this vinegar on roasted veggies, in soups, anywhere you like a bit of tangy flavor. So glad to be able to get it online as the store near us closed some time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent - great flavors, a bit sweet, fruity, sour, rich - love using it in my dishes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Yes! Yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: So delicious! My very favorite salad dressing. Amazing flavor. Nice texture. I’m
customer_reviews.author: Pandam0m

customer_reviews.title: Delicious balsamic vinegar
customer_reviews.text: I tried this when I ran out of my balsamic vinegar, it is delicious. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: G Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: The taste is almost syrupy, would be great even on ice cream
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G. White

customer_reviews.title: amazing flavor, and pretty thick aged vinegar
customer_reviews.text: it's really tasty, and even though not cheap like the cheap vinegars, this is a good value
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Best Vinegar EVER!
customer_reviews.text: O & Co. Premium Balsamic Vinegar is worth every penny!!! I first discovered it on a trip to Paris and was delighted to learn I could purchase it here in the States through Amazon. Very smooth with only a hint of the acid you want in a vinegar. Bon appetit!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa White

customer_reviews.title: Tasty addition to cooking ...
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty ... adds a nice flavor to hot dishes , fruit & salads ...
customer_reviews.author: Susan Grosskopf

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: We like it. Not as good as the really high dollar stuff, but way better than the cheap stuff. So, pretty good value.
customer_reviews.author: clint

customer_reviews.title: This is great balsamic vinegar!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, thick, flavorful balsamic vinegar, great on salads and vegetable.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Scrumptious!
customer_reviews.text: This balsamic vinegar is delicious! It’s expensive but well worth it. This is one indulgence I treat myself to on a regular basis. It also makes a very nice gift with a bottle of olive oil.
customer_reviews.author: Starshine

customer_reviews.title: There is just no better balsamic vinegar
customer_reviews.text: There is just no better balsamic vinegar. Just wish the shipping costs weren't so horrendous. $13 to ship the bottle just seems a little out of line. But, I keep paying it because the product is so good. Smooth. Softly sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great item from France.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, tried it in France and returned home and purchased on Amazon so I didn’t have to carry it in my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Decca hodge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really expensive but tastes like ambrosia. Seriously this is the best balsamic I've ever tasted.
customer_reviews.author: M. OMALLEY

customer_reviews.title: This is just excellent for a reasonably priced Aged Balsamic
customer_reviews.text: This is just excellent for a reasonably priced Aged Balsamic. I use it all of the time and will probably use a bottle every two months or so. I don't buy the inexpensive stuff anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Fred N. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: O & CO Balsamic Vinegar of Modena
customer_reviews.text: We bought our first bottle in France last year and it has simply revoluntionized our eating experience. We tried it first on salad with good olive oil ( it takes just a teaspoon or so of the vinegar), but were soon looking online for other ways to use it. It is amazing for adding flavor to so many things!! I frankly can't recommend it highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ruppaloha

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting - Expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tasting vinegar! Just wish it wasn't so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: A superior Balamic Vinegar
customer_reviews.text: This is a superior Balsamic Vinegar. I regularly use it on my salads and it is very well received by my family.
customer_reviews.author: JTT

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: It’s very good. It’s one of my favorite. It has a mildly sweet flavor and I add it to everything I eat.
customer_reviews.author: Simitato

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever made. I've bought 3 bottles over the past 5 years. Everyone falls in love with it. Great with bread
customer_reviews.author: TechMind

customer_reviews.title: Soooo good
customer_reviews.text: Love this Balsamic Vinegar! I always serve it to guests, and it makes a wonderful hostess gift. Not your normal balsamic vinegar - Way better!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Blank

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable flavor
customer_reviews.text: Best balsamic vinegar I ever tasted. Received it asa gift for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: carol r pastorino

customer_reviews.title: Luscious
customer_reviews.text: This is the most luscious balsamic I have ever found. I bought one for myself and one for a friend because she loved it so much. Pricey but amazingly good.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Balsamic Vinegar
customer_reviews.text: THis is the best balsamic vinegar I have ever tasted. Last year, I bought several and gave them as gifts for guests who came to dinner during the Christmas season. People always ask what it is when they taste it.
customer_reviews.author: SMartin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite balsamic at this price point. Thick, sort of sweet, no weird aftertaste. Really delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Jill I.

customer_reviews.title: Transforms Salads
customer_reviews.text: We were given a bottle of this a couple of years ago and are now hooked and cannot go back to supermarket balsamic vinegar. Once you try it, you'll be hooked.
customer_reviews.author: John D Laupheimer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect fig balsamic
customer_reviews.text: The perfect fig balsamic to increase the tast of both sweet and salty dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Grand Favre

customer_reviews.title: Modena Basalmic High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Olivers & Co Premium Balsamic Vinegar of Modena delivers high quality product for a modest price. This is THE best basalmic we 've tried, and we've tested many over the years. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn C

customer_reviews.title: Better packaging needed
customer_reviews.text: Container was delivered with a major dent requiring transfer of basil flavored olive oil to another container. Flavor was superb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it a lot. I’ve been using it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: jovt

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Balsamic EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best balsamic I've ever used. I haven't wanted to use any other balsamic since tasting this several years ago. Thick, sweet, fabulous on anything. Need I say more?
customer_reviews.author: krissy

customer_reviews.title: Please tell me I got a bad bottle and it won't happen again
customer_reviews.text: Has anyone else gotten a bad bottle? I have been buying this vinegar for years but my most recent bottle tastes like what you get in the grocery store. It's thin and very acidic and not very sweet. What a horrible shock. I would assume the quality control would prevent this kind of thing and fear they have changed something. I certainly won't continue to spend almost $50 if they have reduced the quality. Even my daughter, who is not a connossieur of these things, immediately noticed it was different.
customer_reviews.author: Anni~

customer_reviews.title: Best balsamic ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product I’ve been using it for a while this is my third bottle and my family loves it!! They delivered the day after. Amazing service!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Clara

customer_reviews.title: Very Special
customer_reviews.text: This Balsamic is special.....thick and sweet....on vegetables or in a salad...perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta S. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: delicious. great on salad or strawberries. no too strong , but robust flavor
customer_reviews.author: Richard B. Keigley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It's too bad it's so expensive though
customer_reviews.author: androide2

customer_reviews.title: Best balsamic!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several balsamic vinegars and this is by far my favorite. It is expensive but worth every drop!
customer_reviews.author: SCC

customer_reviews.title: Best balsamic vinegar ever
customer_reviews.text: Best balsamic vinegar ever! This has spoiled me from even the very best sold at popular gourmet kitchen stores
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: Every cook needs this.
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this balsamic vinegar for over 10 years. Just love it!
customer_reviews.author: nancy thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite balsamic vinegar!! We won't buy any other kind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best vinegar out there
customer_reviews.text: Best vinegar out there! Its thick and sweet. Doesn't compare to anything you find in grocery markets. We got our first bottle as a gift 4 yrs ago & have been using it and gifting it as well, ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Lemmons

customer_reviews.title: Sensational Balsamic
customer_reviews.text: Had original bought this in France and loved it so much, I brought some home. Was so pleased to see I could get it on Amazon. The taste is amazing! Aged to perfection. All flavors wonderful but Fig is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best Balsamic Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best tasting Balsamic i have ever tasted. Just drizzle some good olive oil over it and mop it up with good crusty bread.
customer_reviews.author: Ray N

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced squared
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe this vinegar: about 1/3 the size and 3 times the price of Costco's Kirkland Brand. To use this on salad, as was recommended, is a waste AND too sweet; probably better with bread on a sandwich, though Costco's brand will do fine at that as well. We are not Costco members - friends pick a few bottles up for us every year - so no reason to shill for Costco! Amazon prices normally the best; in this case, shouldn't even bother offering this product. Highway robbery.
customer_reviews.author: Andy M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, great flavor. The internal pouring spout makes for a great drizzling effect; not too effective when you want to pour a tablespoon and removal of that spout is tricky--unacceptable when you are in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Dare

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is the best. No other compares with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Denny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, full bodied. Tried others but this has been the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great!!
customer_reviews.text: When Williams and Sonoma stopped carrying their balsamic vinegar I didn't know which one to try next. I went on line and read the review of this product. It is absolutely wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: joseph r gaeta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This vinegar is truly some of the best that I have tasted!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Upchurch

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I received it as a gift and now I will use it all the time. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dorthaan Kirk

product_meta.title: Oliviers & Co Premium Balsamic Vinegar of Modena
feature_bullets: 🍇 FOOD PAIRINGS: Everything! Mesclun salads, grilled shrimp, grilled asparagus, steamed vegetables, grilled meats, as a glaze, and terrific on strawberries, vanilla gelato or both together!

🍇 Most strict of certifications, the 4-Leaf Grade System, in which Oliviers & Co's Balsamic Vinegar is ranked with the highest grade - a guarantee of its delicious, rich and intense taste, complex flavors and captivating aromas.
🍇 Storage instruction: keep in a cool and dry place.
